contents.text: Thank you for calling Formation in San Francisco, where we empower organizations with AI-driven, personalized customer journeys.
Press 1 for Sales and product inquiries.
Press 1 to schedule a personalized product demonstration.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for a product demonstration.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized demo of the AI-driven customer journey platform.
I’d like to schedule a demo of your AI-driven customer journey platform for our veterans outreach program.
I want to schedule a live product walkthrough of your AI personalization platform.
I’d like to set up a one-on-one demonstration of your AI customer journey platform.
I would like to schedule a personalized demonstration of Formation's AI-driven customer journey platform for my research group.

contents.text: Press 2 for pricing, quotes, and licensing information.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing specialist.

navigationGoals: Obtain detailed pricing, quotes, and licensing options for Formation’s solution.
Can I get a detailed quote for licensing your platform for my veteran support nonprofit?
I need a detailed enterprise licensing quote and pricing breakdown.
I need details on your software’s pricing plans and licensing options.
I'm seeking a detailed quote on licensing fees for academic and non-profit use of Formation's solution.

contents.text: Press 2 for Customer Support and service.
Press 1 for technical support and troubleshooting.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Get help troubleshooting a technical issue with the platform.
I need technical assistance integrating your service into our veterans assistance portal.
I’m experiencing integration errors and need technical support for my API.
I’m experiencing technical issues and need help troubleshooting the product.
I'm encountering errors integrating Formation's API with my lab's software and need technical troubleshooting.

contents.text: Press 2 for account management and billing inquiries.
Please hold while we connect you to our accounts and billing team.

navigationGoals: Clarify billing charges and update account settings.
I need to review and clarify my organization’s latest billing statement for our account.
I want to modify my subscription tier and clarify recent billing charges.
I need assistance reviewing my account billing and recent invoice charges.
I need to update my billing information and clarify a recent invoice charge on my account.
